Rockville.Cabin John Middle School:
Cabin John Middle School, colloquially known as CJMS, is a public school for students in grades 6, 7, and 8 located in Potomac, Maryland.
Cabin John opened in 1967 as a junior high school, and its mascot was the roadrunner. In 1987, the school closed due to declining enrollment, and all students in the area attended Hoover.
